entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IMauiContext not found when calling IImageSourceHandler.LoadImageAsync() #7646
  • Splash screen on Samsung S20 Android 12 #7645
  • Revert #7642 for .NET 7.0 #7643
    .NET 7
  • Blazor MAUI integration err_addresss_invalid #7641
  • Rendering is not visible before rebuilding the entire control #7639
  • Error starting Android app: cannot locate symbol "mono_opt_aot_lazy_assembly_load" #7636
  • Problem with Grouped CollectionView on Windows #7634
  • SVG Icon display and scaling issues, platform dependent. #7629
  • Shell Navigation to another Tab doesn't work as I expect it would #7628
  • [Android] Editor typing is inconsistent #7627
  • Button CornerRadius does not work yet #7626
  • Build / Publish solution in Developer PowerShell #7625
  • Entry (IsPassword="True") Placeholder does not take a FontFamily #7624
  • FlexLayout does not re-layout when a child's visibility changes #7621
  • [iOS]Grouped CollectionView have extra space on ios and maccatalyst #7620
  • Label LineHeight not working and multiline issues #7618

Closed

  • Animations seems to be broken on Android 12 Physical Device #7632
  • MAUI project requires bin/obj folders removed for any MacOS build following a successful one #7353
  • Unable to disable zooming in MAUI Blazor App for Windows #7569
  • AddWpfBlazorWebView failing in release #7589
  • [Bug] CollectionView ScrollTo methods not working on Android #2891
    6.0-servicing
  • FlexLayout doesn't account for children size #6826
    6.0-sr1
  • ActivityIndicator always shown, even if IsRunning is false #6455
    6.0-servicing
  • [Bug] iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #3643
    6.0-sr1
  • VerticalOptions doesn't work inside a layout. #7537
  • Re-Enable browser developer tools for debugging webview in maui #7557

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert a type move for net6 #7642
    blocker, p/0, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr1
  • Fix issue when the title is an empty string #7638
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Implement quit Application #7633
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, 6.0-sr1
  • [Tizen] Fix RendererToHandlerShim.Tizen #7622
    platform/tizen, 6.0-sr1

Merged

  • [Tizen] [NET7.0] Bump up Samsung Tizen Sdk version #7637
  • [Tizen] Update Samsung Tizen SDK Version for 6.0.400 band #7640
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    area/setup 🪄, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Fix ActivityIndicator with initial IsRunning value to False #7609
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, control-activityindicator, 6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Fix cell size changed on CollectionView #7447
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7617
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Merge the PublicAPI checker into main #7339
    p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0-sr1
  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • More info on templates #7430
    area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr1
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 7
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Fix issue updating Slider Maximum value #7610
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider, 6.0-servicing
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2 #7532
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 7
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
